thread.section_title: Sail Business Loans Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sail Business Loans | sail.com.au
thread.title: Mathew Richardson
thread.title_full: Sail Business Loans reviewed by Mathew Richardson

author: Mathew Richardson
title: Mathew Richardson
text: This was the easiest process ever and I did the whole thing from my home. Being a self employed builder, finance is a nightmare as the products available are too expensive and too hard to qualify for. This has given my business new direction. The agent was awesome to say the least. He was direct and honest about how it worked and he was extremely easy to talk to. I have locked in his details and will keep it handy for my business network group. Thank you guys, onward and upward.
